body:
Comment 1: 
Unfortunately every Git/Hg server has a different
mapping of URL-like path to repository root + file within repository.
This is not an easy problem.

I agree that any Git/Hg server *ought* to work with goinstall,
but I don't know how to do it.
_Labels changed: added **priority-low**, removed **priority-medium**._ _Status changed to **LongTerm**._
